name: @relaybox/client
description: A robust and scalable real-time infrastructure service with comprehensive WebSocket support, designed to facilitate live updates, event-driven communication, and seamless data streaming. Ideal for building real-time applications such as chat, multiplayer games, collaboration tools, push notifications, and more. This library offers both server and client-side solutions, providing a high-performance, low-latency, and reliable framework for all your real-time needs. Supports Node.js, JavaScript, and TypeScript.

scripts.build: npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es2020
